channel.title: Chris Shively PodCast
channel.description: Ambient, new world, electronica free podcast from chrisshively.com featuring ambient chill inspired jazz and classical themes.
channel.itunes:author: Chris Shively
channel.itunes:keywords: ambient, new age, electronic, chill, groove
